qas.question: How many national highways form a junction in Hyderabad?
How many states are linked to from highways in Hyderabad?
How many miles long is NH-7?
How many state highways pass through or begin in Hyderabad?
What road connects Hyderabad to Bhopalpatnam?

context: Hyderabad sits at the junction of <a0_0>three<a0_0/> National Highways linking it to <a1_0>six<a1_0/> other states: NH-7 runs 2,369 km (<a2_0>1,472 mi<a2_0/>) from Varanasi, Uttar Pradesh, in the north to Kanyakumari, Tamil Nadu, in the south; NH-9, runs 841 km (523 mi) east-west between Machilipatnam, Andhra Pradesh, and Pune, Maharashtra; and the 280 km (174 mi) <a4_0>NH-163<a4_0/> links Hyderabad to Bhopalpatnam, Chhattisgarh NH-765 links Hyderabad to Srisailam. <a3_0>Five<a3_0/> state highways, SH-1, SH-2, SH-4, SH-5 and SH-6, either start from, or pass through, Hyderabad.:58
